Package controller

Class OfficerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.OfficerController
  • public class OfficerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing all officer-related business logic. Handles officer registration, project assignments, application processing, booking management, and enquiry handling. Also provides functionality for officers acting as applicants.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OfficerController()
      Default constructor for the OfficerController.

      • getViewableProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getViewableProjects​(Officer officer)
        Retrieves all projects that an officer can view. Includes visible projects, projects with officer's applications, and projects the officer is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to get viewable projects for
        Returns:
        List of projects the officer can view

      • getFilteredProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getFilteredProjects​(Officer officer,
                                                        Filter filter)
        Filters eligible projects based on specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer whose eligible projects should be filtered
        filter - The filter criteria to apply
        Returns:
        List of projects matching the filter criteria

      • getAppliedProjects

        Retrieves all projects that an officer has applied for as an applicant. Includes projects with applications in various states.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer whose applications to check
        Returns:
        List of projects the officer has applied for

      • createOfficerApplication

        public OfficerApplication createOfficerApplication​(Officer officer,
                                                   Project project)
        Creates a new application for an officer to be assigned to a project. Verifies eligibility and availability before creating the application.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer applying for project assignment
        project - The project to apply for assignment to
        Returns:
        The created officer application if successful, null otherwise

      • processBooking

        public boolean processBooking​(Officer officer,
                              Booking booking)
        Processes a booking request submitted by an applicant. Verifies officer authorization, booking status, flat availability, and updates related entities.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer processing the booking
        booking - The booking to process
        Returns:
        True if the booking was processed successfully, false otherwise

      • createApplication

        public BTOApplication createApplication​(Officer officer,
                                        Project project,
                                        FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Creates a new BTO application for an officer acting as an applicant. Checks for conflicts of interest, eligibility, and active applications before creating the application.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer applying for a BTO flat
        project - The project being applied for
        flatType - The type of flat being applied for
        Returns:
        The created application if successful, null otherwise

      • getApplications

        Retrieves all applications submitted by an officer acting as an applicant.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer whose applications to retrieve
        Returns:
        List of all applications submitted by the officer

      • requestWithdrawal

        public boolean requestWithdrawal​(BTOApplication application)
        Requests withdrawal of an application submitted by an officer. Changes the application's withdrawal status to pending.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to withdraw
        Returns:
        True if withdrawal request was successful, false otherwise

      • bookFlat

        public boolean bookFlat​(BTOApplication application,
                        FlatType flatType)
        Books a flat for a successful application submitted by an officer. Verifies eligibility, application status, flat availability, and updates related entities.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to book a flat for
        flatType - The type of flat to book
        Returns:
        True if booking was successful, false otherwise

                             Project project,
                             java.lang.String content)

        Parameters:
        officer - The officer submitting the enquiry
        project - The project the enquiry is about
        content - The content of the enquiry
        Returns:
        The created enquiry if successful, null otherwise

      • editEnquiry

        public boolean editEnquiry​(Enquiry enquiry,
                           java.lang.String newContent)
        Edits the content of a pending enquiry. Only allows editing of enquiries with PENDING status.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The enquiry to edit
        newContent - The new content for the enquiry
        Returns:
        True if edit was successful, false otherwise

      • replyToEnquiry

        public boolean replyToEnquiry​(Officer officer,
                              Enquiry enquiry,
                              java.lang.String response)
        Allows an officer to reply to an enquiry. Verifies that the officer is assigned to the project and the enquiry is in pending status.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer replying to the enquiry
        enquiry - The enquiry to reply to
        response - The response content
        Returns:
        True if the reply was successful, false otherwise

      • changePassword

                              java.lang.String newPassword)

        Parameters:
        officer - The officer whose password to change
        oldPassword - The current password for verification
        newPassword - The new password
        Returns:
        True if password change was successful, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        password - The password to verify
        Returns:
        True if password is correct, false otherwise

      • isEligibleForProject

        public static boolean isEligibleForProject​(Officer officer,
                                           Project project)
        Checks if an officer is eligible for a specific project as an applicant. Verifies application period, conflicts of interest, age requirements, and eligibility for at least one flat type.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check eligibility for
        project - The project to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        True if the officer is eligible, false otherwise

      • hasAppliedForProject

        public static boolean hasAppliedForProject​(Officer officer,
                                           Project project)
        Checks if an officer has previously applied for a project.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check
        project - The project to check
        Returns:
        True if the officer has already applied, false otherwise

      • hasActiveApplications

        public static boolean hasActiveApplications​(Officer officer)
        Checks if an officer has any active BTO applications. This includes pending, successful, or booked applications that are not withdrawn.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check
        Returns:
        True if the officer has active applications, false otherwise

      • isEligibleForFlatType

        public static boolean isEligibleForFlatType​(Officer officer,
                                            FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Checks if an officer is eligible for a specific flat type. Applies rules based on marital status and age: - Singles must be 35+ and can only apply for 2-room flats - Married applicants must be 21+
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check eligibility for
        flatType - The flat type to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        True if the officer is eligible, false otherwise

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password)
        Validates that a password meets the required criteria. Currently checks for minimum length of 8 characters.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to validate
        Returns:
        True if the password is valid, false otherwise

      • generateReceipt

        public Receipt generateReceipt​(Officer officer,
                               Booking booking)
        Generates a receipt for a confirmed booking.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer generating the receipt
        booking - The booking to generate a receipt for
        Returns:
        The generated receipt, or null if generation failed

      • isEligibleForProjectRegistration

        public boolean isEligibleForProjectRegistration​(Officer officer,
                                                Project project)
        Checks if an officer is eligible to register for a project. Verifies the officer is not already assigned and the project has slots.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check
        project - The project to register for
        Returns:
        true if eligible, false otherwise

      • getEligibleProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getEligibleProjects​(Officer officer)
        Retrieves all projects that an officer is eligible to apply for. This includes visible projects that match eligibility criteria or projects the officer has already applied for.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        List of projects the officer is eligible to apply for
